description:
A flying vehicle stationed at the http://anidb.net/ch25695 [Sonohara Air Base].
Actually this is an UFO with alien technology (http://anidb.net/ch6964 [Kunihiro] describes it as "living being").
Only a few selected pilots with a modified nervous system and ESP abilities (such as http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Iriya Kana] and http://anidb.net/ch21805 [Erika Proudfoot]) can pilot it, and Kana is the last surviving pilot.
name: Black Manta
